currentState.summary: ASSIGNMENT RECEIVED. Architecture doc v11.0 at 1923 lines (condensed from 3539). R9-R11 complete (multi-model consensus 92/100). Requirements parsed. Ready for Phase 4: Implementation.

nextSteps.description: Plan implementation: agent team composition, file ownership, execution order
Collect Mohegan Sun property data (restaurants, rooms, entertainment, promos)
Build working LangGraph agent + RAG pipeline + FastAPI API
Multi-model evaluation (Grok, Perplexity, GPT-5.2, Gemini, Claude) — target 95+/100

assignment.core: Property-aware Q&A chatbot using LangGraph. One casino property. Tests + Docker + API. Open-ended design decisions.

keyActions: R9: Team swarm (4 agents) — 81 findings, 46% line reduction (3539→1916), 6 bugs fixed
R10: Coherence pass — 13 broken references fixed post-surgery
R11: Multi-model (Gemini 3 Pro) — 92/100, Strong Yes, 3 new fixes
Assignment PDF read and requirements parsed
Gap analysis: architecture doc is superset, need to scale down and build actual code
